title: Paramount to cut 3% of U.S. workforce as it deepens cost-cutting
description: It's the latest round of layoffs at Paramount as it contends with cord-cutting and prepares to merge with Skydance Media.

title: This is what really happened with Siri and Apple Intelligence, according to Apple
description: Is it a delay, a strategy... or something else?

title: Troops deployed to LA will cost $134M, Pentagon predicts
description: The estimate came during a budget hearing with Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth, who said the president is enforcing “law and order.”

title: Terry Moran Out at ABC News
description: The long-time correspondent won’t return to the network after his suspension over a social media post criticizing Trump adviser Stephen Miller.

title: Bob Iger Says Disney Unlikely to Follow Comcast and Warner Bros. Discovery In Exiting the TV Channel
description: The CEO also said that Disney+ will "probably" emulate Netflix and stop reporting subscriber numbers at some point, he noted during a CNBC appearance.

title: 2024 U.S. YouTube Impact Report
description: Learn how YouTube empowers creators and fuels the US economy. Our new report highlights a $55B US GDP contribution and 490K jobs supported, showcasing two decades of shared growth and creator success.
